article:
'Equivalence' is a term applied by the Uruguay Round Agreement on the
Application of Sanitary and Phytosanitary Measures. WTO Member countries shall
accord acceptance to the Sanitary and Phytosanitary (SPS) measures of other
countries (even if those measures differ from their own or from those used by
other Member countries trading in the same product) if the exporting country
demonstrates to the importing country that its measures achieve the importerâs
appropriate level of sanitary and phytosanitary protection.
